jcr:content.seoTitle: Parents | Girl Scouts of San Jacinto

text.text:
Resident Camp Info for Parents
Sending your daughter to resident camp for the first time? Want to know what to expect? Find all that and more in our Resident Camp Parent Guides or by attending a new parent orientation or open house event.

2015 Resident Camp Parent Guide
Camp Agnes Arnold Parent Guide 2015 – coming soon!
Camp Casa Mare Parent Guide 2015 – coming soon!
Camp Misty Meadows Parent Guide 2015 – coming soon!

2015 Resident Camp Open House
Parents, campers and their families are invited to attend our annual Open House events. This is a great opportunity to view the camp facilities (including living accommodations), tour the camp and enjoy some camp activities like archery, crafts, songs and games, grooming horses (Misty Meadows only) and canoeing (Arnold only – weather permitting). Bring a picnic lunch or snacks and stay for the afternoon!

Cost: Free! (Please DO NOT bring pets)
Dates:  2015 dates coming soon!

text_0.text:
2015 New Parent Orientation

Parents of new and returning campers are encouraged to attend this brief orientation that takes place in person and via webinar. Learn what and how to pack, what type of meals are served, how camp staff copes with homesickness (and how parents can help prevent it!), how the Trading Post/Ship’s Store works, what to expect at check in/check out and more!

Cost: Free!
Dates: 2015 dates coming soon!
